doc: After adding VREffect and VRControls into the [ocean](http://threejs.org/examples/webgl_shaders_ocean.html) and [mirror](http://threejs.org/examples/webgl_mirror.html) examples, the mirror breaks when presenting to the vrDisplay.
[vr + 2 mirrors](http://davidscottlyons.com/threejs/vr-mirror/2-mirrors.html) - ground mirror works, vertical mirror breaks
